message:
Dear HR Team,

We would like to inform you that the Head of Department has successfully submitted remarks for {{ doc.employee_name }} in the Confirmation Evaluation Form. Kindly proceed with the subsequent steps as per the confirmation process.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Confirmation Remarks For HR
subject: HOD Remarks Submitted – Confirmation Evaluation
